actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Ways and Means

official_title: A concurrent resolution expressing the sense of the Congress that the Economic Recovery Tax Act of 1981 should not now be substantially amended and that every effort must be made to reduce the national deficit by ending excessive Federal spending.

summary.text: Expresses the sense of the Congress that the Economic Recovery Tax Act of 1981 should not be substantially amended and that efforts must be made to reduce the national deficit by ending excessive Federal spending.

titles.title: A concurrent resolution expressing the sense of the Congress that the Economic Recovery Tax Act of 1981 should not now be substantially amended and that every effort must be made to reduce the national deficit by ending excessive Federal spending.
